zh_female_gentle.name: 温柔女声
zh_female_gentle.text: 你好，很高兴为你服务。今天天气不错，希望你有美好的一天。

zh_female_lively.name: 活泼女声
zh_female_lively.text: 哇！这个真的太棒了！快来一起看看吧，绝对让你惊喜！

zh_male_calm.name: 沉稳男声
zh_male_calm.text: 尊敬的各位来宾，欢迎大家参加今天的会议。接下来由我为大家介绍项目进展。

zh_male_young.name: 年轻男声
zh_male_young.text: 嘿，兄弟！这波操作太秀了吧！下次带我一起开黑啊！

en_female_warm.name: Warm Female
en_female_warm.text: Hello! Welcome to our service. I'm here to help you with anything you need.

en_female_professional.name: Professional Female
en_female_professional.text: Good morning everyone. Let's begin with the quarterly financial report.

en_male_friendly.name: Friendly Male
en_male_friendly.text: Hey there! Thanks for checking out our app. Let me show you around.
